group_1.textLeft: But…after coming here, something else@has come up…

group_1.textRight: …What's that?

group_1.textLeft: It may be presumptuous of me, but…
…I want to save you!

group_1.textRight: To save…me?!

group_1.textLeft: Yes…
I'm going to save you from sharing@Cleopatra's fate.
I can't simply turn my back on this!
You should be allowed to choose a new road@for yourself.
We, too, have begun to move forward again,@shouldering the burden of our past…
Again, I don't mean to sound presumptuous…@but I want you to be able to do the same.

group_1.textRight: I don't know if that's possible.
Our goal is to save Iroha, remember?
We're not here to rescue this girl.
…What? Just a little while ago…@Could it be that…YOU were that voice…?

group_1.textLeft: She is, but…look, we'll explain that later!

group_1.textRight: Moreover, helping this girl may disrupt@the course of history.
And that is strictly forbidden.

group_1.textLeft: But have we finished collecting@Iroha's concept?

group_1.textRight: …We have not.

group_1.textLeft: Then that means we need to keep following@Ebony, yes?

group_1.textRight: …Correct.

group_1.textLeft: Not to mention, everything we've@already done…
Doesn't that already count as interfering@with history?

group_1.textRight: That was necessary in order to narrow@down the scope of Iroha's surveillance.
I have determined that nothing we've done@has critically altered history in any way.
But now that we have verified the truth...
...we cannot interfere any longer.@It's best we observe at a distance.

group_1.textLeft: Even after we've discussed so much?

group_1.textRight: If anything, now is when we must draw a line.

group_1.textLeft: Okay, one more question.
Does this book tell the whole story of this era?

group_1.textRight: If it had, we would not be in this situation.

group_1.textLeft: Then couldn't this be a possible course of fate?
Perhaps if we stay away from Ebony, we won't@retrieve the rest of the fragments…
…Or something like that.
Instead, by staying with her, THAT'S how we're@meant to gather them up…
…You know. Something like that.

group_1.textRight: That's…
…I cannot deny that possibility.

group_1.textLeft: And what about the possibility that saving her@wouldn't interfere with history?

group_1.textRight: …So that's what these questions were@building up to.
But no, I cannot deny that possibility either.
…Odd. None of you seem surprised@by what she said.

group_1.textLeft: Nah…Shizuka took the words right@outta my mouth!
Yeah, same!

group_1.textRight: My thoughts exactly.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I'm with Shizuka, too!

group_1.textRight: Indeed, I felt likewise!
…Good grief.

group_1.textLeft: As long as we don't alter major historical@events, then we're fine, right?
So as long as we don't touch them…!

group_1.textRight: But…

group_1.textLeft: And besides! If you were in our position,@you would never abandon Ebony!
…At least, that's what I think.

group_1.textRight: The branches of possibility spread outwards@infinitely…
The route we should choose ought to be@the one with the least risk…
And yet all of you deliberately turn headlong@into that risk…
…But if Big Sister were here…she…

group_1.textLeft: …What do you think?

group_1.textRight: …You Tokime Clan girls are incorrigible.
Very well, then…
I doubt even my lone objection would be@enough to sway your opinion.
What’s more, the possibility remains that@taking this risk is the right course of action.

group_1.textLeft: …Thank you so much!

group_1.textRight: My goodness…

group_1.textLeft: Ebony!

group_1.textRight: Wh-what is it…?

group_1.textLeft: There's way too much detail to get into…
But simply put, you are now at a crossroads.

group_1.textRight: …What do you mean…?

group_1.textLeft: It's time for you to choose whether you want@a new life or not!
